description: Number of polyominoes with n cells.
comments: A000105 is the main entry for this sequence.
references: Dan Hoey, Bill Gosper and Rich Schroeppel, Discussions in Math-Fun Mailing list, circa Jul 13 1999.
W. F. Lunnon, Counting multidimensional polyominoes. Computer Journal 18 (1975), no. 4, pp. 366-367.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: N. J. A. Sloane, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..45
R. C. Schroeppel, A few mathematical experiments
crossrefs: Equals A000105(n)-1. A row of A049429. A column of A049430.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: Edited by _N. J. A. Sloane_, Sep 23 2011.
